headline: MetLife Recommends Shareholders Reject "Mini-Tender" Offer by Potemkin Limited
summary: NEW YORK, September 15, 2025--MetLife, Inc. (NYSE: MET) today announced that it has received notice of an unsolicited mini-tender offer by Potemkin Limited ("Potemkin") to purchase up to 10,000 shares of MetLife, Inc. common stock from MetLife shareholders. The offer is for approximately 0.00002 percent of MetLife’s shares of common stock outstanding as of August 31, 2025. Potemkin’s offer price of $53.00 per share is approximately 34.42 percent lower than the $80.82 closing price of MetLife com

content.title: MetLife Recommends Shareholders Reject "Mini-Tender" Offer by Potemkin Limited
content.summary: NEW YORK, September 15, 2025--MetLife, Inc. (NYSE: MET) today announced that it has received notice of an unsolicited mini-tender offer by Potemkin Limited ("Potemkin") to purchase up to 10,000 shares of MetLife, Inc. common stock from MetLife shareholders. The offer is for approximately 0.00002 percent of MetLife’s shares of common stock outstanding as of August 31, 2025. Potemkin’s offer price of $53.00 per share is approximately 34.42 percent lower than the $80.82 closing price of MetLife com
